author: ninjaxy
post_text: August 29, 2016 at 9:47 AM#1Hi Everyone,Is it possible to write a macro which could assign a fade time, lets said "5s", to the current running next cue in the selected sequence ?Appreciate if anyone could help!

posts.author: ninjaxy
posts.post_text: August 29, 2016 at 9:47 AM#1Hi Everyone,Is it possible to write a macro which could assign a fade time, lets said "5s", to the current running next cue in the selected sequence ?Appreciate if anyone could help!

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: August 29, 2016 at 10:06 AM#2something like this might do the job:CodePreview NextAssign PreviewExecutor Fade 5PreviewEdit Off

posts.author: ninjaxy
posts.post_text: August 29, 2016 at 12:20 PM#3Thank you ! It works

title: Assign fade time to current next cue
